faq.title: Good to Know
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.

faq.items.title: Which markets and timeframes are supported?
faq.items.description: Our strategy is optimized for Bitcoin but can be applied to other volatile assets and timeframes above 4 hours.

faq.items.title: How does the system handle market volatility?
faq.items.description: The strategy adapts dynamically to changing market conditions, maintaining stability even during turbulent periods.

faq.items.title: Are all trades profitable?
faq.items.description: No. Losses are part of any trading strategy. The system focuses on managing downside risk while maintaining statistical edge over time.

faq.items.title: Is the system suitable for beginners?
faq.items.description: Yes. Fully automated operation and intuitive design make it easy to start — no prior experience required.

faq.items.title: How do I access the strategy?
faq.items.description: After subscribing, you can run and manage the strategy directly through your account — quick and straightforward.

faq.items.title: Can I customize the strategy?
faq.items.description: Yes. Key parameters such as risk profile and trading behavior can be adjusted to match your preferences.

faq.items.title: Is my capital safe?
faq.items.description: Yes. The system does not access your wallet or funds. You retain full control over your investments at all times.

faq.items.title: How much does the system cost?
faq.items.description: We offer subscription plans tailored to different needs — transparent, fair, and performance-oriented.

faq.items.title: Is there a trial version?
faq.items.description: Yes. You can test the strategy free for 7 days to evaluate its performance. After the trial, you can choose a subscription that fits your trading style.

faq.items.title: What kind of support is provided?
faq.items.description: Our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email to assist you whenever needed.
